name: The Cat in the Hat
description: Two bored children have their lives turned upside down when a talking cat comes to visit them.

review.author: ersbel
review.heading: An okay movie with nice visuals
review.reviewBody: This is an okay movie. And the visuals are nice. The virtual world is really polished. And the colorful costumes do make a break from the usual movie. The jokes are okay, but nothing special. And the children seem to have fun. But, boy, I had no idea Dr. Seus was a fundamentalist Christian poster boy. That would explain the poor box office results compared with worse movies.\n\nContact me with Questions, Comments or Suggestions ryitfork @ bitmail.ch
